layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x135
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x135
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x119
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
layer at (8,8) size 37x119 clip at (9,9) size 20x117
  LayoutListBox {SELECT} at (0,0) size 37x119 [bgcolor=#FFFFFF] [border: (1px solid #A9A9A9)]
    LayoutBlockFlow {OPTION} at (1,1) size 20x13
      LayoutText {#text} at (2,0) size 16x12
        text run at (2,0) width 16: "test"
